metadata.name: Chromabstraction #1
metadata.description:
Chromesthesia is an ongoing project in which I take AI generated imagery, original drawings and fractal creations and run them through various applications multiple times until they are deconstructed into glitchy abstractions. 

This new series is a collection of hybrid paintings that combine my Chromesthesia artwork and abstract paintings in digital collage.

4000x4000 JPG
